argument._content: The id of the photo to return tags for.
argument.name: photo_id

description._content: Get the tag list for a given photo.

explanation._content: For an explanation of the tag element, please read the tags documentation.

response._content:
<photo id="2619">
	<tags>

			authorname="Bees" raw="tag 1">tag1</tag>

	</tags>
